reviews.review: When I got this game I didn't expect to pay for it and finish it on the same day. That said, this game is amazing! An absolute classic. Since this was my first time playing it I absolutely understood why this game was so popular and beloved. Although short, it DOES NOT take away from the gameplay and story. Would recommend this to anyone who hasn't played it.
wow, a truly great game

玩过传送门2回来补传送门1；

因为有2的基础，觉得传送门1也挺简单的；

迷宫很有趣，AI很可爱，多重人格的BOSS在游戏结束时唱的歌真的令我感动；

游戏里到处都有小细节；PPT透露了光圈科技和黑山实验室的【坎坷爱情】；

威尔弗的经典之作，让我在迷宫里苦恼，找到线索的惊喜，通关时的自豪，AI唱歌的感动，三小时的震撼；

真的是游戏史上不可多得的好作品；

谢谢，传送门的开发者们！
En su tiempo lo jugué pirata, solamente lo compré para poder apoyar a los creadores, lofiu valve.
sou daqueles que jogou o 2 primeiro
es corto pero extremadamente imersivo de los mejores juegos
One of the best games I've ever played.

This was a pretty fun game. I found Glados to be pretty entertaining and the puzzles quite fun and challenging.

The only real complaint I have is that the game is pretty short. Other than that though, it's a pretty fun experience.

Un classico che consiglio per la meccanica dei portali, ma, soffermandomi soprattutto sugli aspetti negativi, sappiate che:
1) l'avventura dura all'incirca 2 ore. Con gli extra saliamo a 3-4 (a seconda di quanto bene vogliate completarli).
2) ha i suoi anni, la grafica è quella che è.
3) la "storia" non è chiara volutamente, è lasciata all'immaginazione del giocatore. Non sapremo mai chi siamo, cosa ci facciamo in questo posto e dove stiamo andando.
4) l'85% abbondante del gioco è tutorial (cioè "risolvi il puzzle") e il 15% è gioco (cioè "raggiungi l'obiettivo").

Concludo dicendo che il gioco è bello, ma nella sua interezza dà la sensazione di essere una demo dove mostrare la potenzialità della meccanica dei portali.
Da acquistare solo quando scontato: 0,90€ li merita tutti, 10€ assolutamente no.
Some games are just fun to play, this is one of them.  Pick it up in the sale if looking for something different from running and gunning.
Aldığı parayı hakeden bir oyun.İndirimde iken kaçırmadım.

Will always be a favorite. You can get sucked up in it for hours, or jump on for a few minutes.
Great game, just a little too much on the short side. Like me
I dont get a cake ;-;

The Portal Gun seems to be the selling point of the game, but it has more than that. The puzzles don't feel slacked and repetitive, it rather made me feel intrigued during the whole game as puzzles were genuinely creative thanks to the various obstacles.

The story also plays a huge role in the game's excellence. Dialogues were humorous and didn't seem to be a forced afterthought. For the usual discounted price of about 1-2 USD I can't think of a game with better value.
Ein Spiel, das nicht altert und mich sehr zum Durchspielen animiert. Allein schon, um GlaDOS im Nachspann singen zu hören. Unsterblich halt!

Игра, где действительно надо думать! Затягивает так, что невозможно из неё выйти или даже хочется сыграть несколько раз. Прелестный чёрный юмор и тортики. Прекрасно!

Oyun güzel ama almanızı tavsiye etmem,şahsen oyunun uzun bir süre süreceğini düşünürken 4 saat olmadan bitirdim.Oyunu oynarken eğlendim ama oyunun fazla uzun bir oynama süresi yok.Umarım Portal 2'de böyle değildir.

Portal is a game I would never buy because it boasts a $10 price tag, it only took me 3 hours to beat the game and i'm VERY new to the portal franchise. However I got it bundled with Portal 2 during the Steam summer sale for a grand total of $2.23, I figured it would be foolish not to get it for only 24 cents. The tests aren't very fun and feel like a hassle but it has an ok story line which is a somewhat redeeming feature. For $10 this game is a rip off, only get it when it is on sale for around a dollar.

Having played Portal 2 earlier, I was really eager to get started with this game. It's fun, challenging, humorous and memorable. While it itself doesn't have a very high story content, it increases the same for Portal 2. The game is really short though; it leaves you wanting more at the end.

Overall this is a great game, and I'd definitely recommend it to all the people who are still alive!
Es ist zwar sehr kurz aber das Geld auf jeden Fall wert.

Bought this during the summer steam sale. It had been a long time since I had last played it on xbox, and since I had never played it on PC, I was happy to pick it up. Boy, am I glad I did. This game is the perfect mixture of puzzling enjoyment and cryptic happiness. Glados is brilliant, and her wonderful song at the end warmed my heart. Remember folks: the cake is a lie.

刚注册了steam帐号，目的之一就是想为之前玩过的喜欢的游戏充值信仰，Portal毫不犹豫，而且怎么这么便宜。。。。
好几年前，在网上偶然找到一款flash版的传送门小游戏，特别喜欢。通关后去搜相关信息，这才知道了Portal本体。加上刚下载完后又过了一遍，这应该是第四还是第五周目了。
作为一个不太资深的解谜游戏迷，portal在我心目中一直占着独一无二的位置。除了因为FPS类解谜游戏实在太少见之外，谜题设计简直是合情合理的脑洞大开！
另外台词配音也是这部游戏的一大重要亮点，请务必在设置—音频中将字幕打开，缺少了这一部分的话，这游戏的趣味性要-60%

Possui puzzle's muito bem feitos e bem pensados, sua jogabilidade é bem simples mas funciona perfeitamente bem, possui uma história relativamente boa e com certeza garante uma boa fluidez. O jogo testa a inteligência do jogador e estimula o raciocínio, passando uma experiência maravilhosa!

都说游戏很赞，就玩了，开场的确被玩法惊艳到了，但是玩了十分钟感觉不太对。但是没在意继续玩了下去。玩了十五分钟感觉胃里在翻涌。。。游戏关掉后躺了好久。玩过无数游戏了，这是第一款让我晕3D的游戏，新手引导都没跑完。 过段时间调整状态再试试。提示下刚玩游戏时最好多注意下自己的身体状态。不要等难受了才反应过来。不然会难受很久。

Bu oyunu ilk defa 2017'de oyanıdım. Ama hiç 10 senelik oyun gibi durmuyor. Bulmacalar çok güzel tavsiye ediyorum.

在未玩过这个游戏之前，我一直以为传送门是一个普通的解密游戏，玩过之后，才发现，原来解密游戏也能有这样引人深思的剧情
①玩之前记得打开字幕，对剧情了解很有帮助
②我不是个晕3d患者，但是这款游戏让我体验到了这种感觉...自重
③游戏价格非常实惠，打折1+2只要7块，还不买买买
结尾曲真是好听啊！！！！

Sempre fui curioso a respeito do Portal 2, mas nunca tive vontade de jogar. Nessa summer sale comprei o pacotinho com o 1 e como é o 1, comecei a jogar antes, óbvio.

É um jogo com uma história muito, mas muito curta (uma pena), mas é divertido demais. Sério.
Não sou um jogador fã de puzzles, mas desse eu gostei, não é aquela coisa impossível de pensar, mas não é tão simples assim, há um equilíbrio. 
A física do jogo é bem bacana, talvez seja o ponto forte do jogo. Controles simples e sem frescuras.
E tem os melhores créditos finais de todos.

Numa promoção boa vale a compra, fora não, por causa do tempo de gameplay (mais uma vez, uma pena que é tão curto).

Spoiler: a história do Portal 2 é quase duas vezes mais longa, o que dá uma leve compensada.
Great game!! A quick exercise for the brain!
